description: Tony, who should be doing his schoolwork, is horny. Locking his bedroom door, he looks at some hidden pics of wrestlers grappling, takes out his own hidden wrestling gear (singlet, kneepads, shoes), caresses it, smells it and puts it on, then from under his mattress pulls out a copy of Bound & Gagged where he finds a much-read story. He starts rereading it (the story in voice-over), stuffing a sock in his mouth and duct-taping it in place and imagining himself-via fade-ins and fade-outs-as the narrator whose best friend and wrestling partner ties him up inescapably. Suddenly Tony ungags himself, jumps out of bed, fishes an old ad from his wallet, and calls the bondage/wrestling Master whose ad it is, to make an appointment for a session. The call completed, Tony gets back on his bed, stuffs the sock back in his mouth, retapes it in, and continues reading until he cums. He wipes himself with his sock gag, then sucks the cum out of the gag and stuffs the sock back in his mouth.
title: Wrestling Horny
